Articles.Content:
I have always loved rockets and such. Being a child of the 60s I grew up with Apollo and all the excitement around that. 

What I'd like around my office at work is some nice big model rockets. 

Trouble is, when I've looked on the web, all I've found are either rockets for launching in the yard (not authentic looking), kits (I don't have the patience), or small stuff. 

I'd like a few detailed, robust models 2ft+ high. 

Anyone know where I can find such things?

[http://www.pilotshop.com/catalog/stpages/KYNS5T.php?gclid=CNKhhKXXj8UCFQmmaQodelAAXQ](http://www.pilotshop.com/catalog/stpages/KYNS5T.php?gclid=CNKhhKXXj8UCFQmmaQodelAAXQ)

That particular Saturn V model (pre-assembled) should be a little over 21 inches tall. Somewhat shorter than requested, but you might have luck poking around there.

edit: I'm noticing they are a touch expensive... yeesh.
